item.title: First Post
item.description: 平台 接口调用次数统计 use platform; select app_id,count(*),api_hash from billing_api_consumption group by app_id,api_hash 接口和apihash的对应关系 SubmitPulseTest– -832952479 GetReport– -488801682 SearchReports– -913874297 GetRawData– -69459196
item.content:
平台

  • 接口调用次数统计

    use platform;
select app_id,count(*),api_hash from billing_api_consumption group by app_id,api_hash

    接口和apihash的对应关系
